item.title: Vicky add a quote by Mawlana Jalal-al-Din Rumi
item.description: "Lovers don't finally meet somewhere. They're in each other all along." -- Mawlana Jalal-al-Din Rumi

item.title: Vicky add a quote by Bruce Lee
item.description: "Use only that which works, and take it from any place you can find it." -- Bruce Lee

item.title: Vicky add a quote by Pablo Neruda, "Poetry"
item.description:
"Mi corazon se desato en el viento.
My heart broke loose on the wind." -- Pablo Neruda, "Poetry"

item.title: Vicky add a quote by Emily Jane Brontë
item.description: "If all else perished, and he remained, I should still continue to be; and if all else remained, and he were annihilated, the universe would turn to a mighty stranger." -- Emily Jane Brontë

item.title: Vicky add a quote by Pablo Neruda
item.description: "I hunger for your sleek laugh and your hands the color of a furious harvest. I want to eat the sunbeams flaring in your beauty." -- Pablo Neruda

item.title: Vicky add a quote by Randy Pausch
item.description: "We cannot change the cards we are dealt, just how we play the hand." -- Randy Pausch

item.title: Vicky add a quote by Robin Sikarwar
item.description: "sleep is such a luxury, which i cant afford." -- Robin Sikarwar

item.title: Vicky add a quote by Pablo Neruda
item.description: "Someday, somewhere - anywhere, unfailingly, you'll find yourself, and that, and only that, can be the happiest or bitterest hour of your life." -- Pablo Neruda

item.title: Vicky add a quote by Pablo Neruda
item.description: "Laughter is the language of the soul." -- Pablo Neruda

item.title: Vicky add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "Don't walk behind me; I may not lead. Don't walk in front of me; I may not follow. Just walk beside me and be my friend." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Vicky add a quote by Katharine Hepburn
item.description: "We are taught you must blame your father, your sisters, your brothers, the school, the teachers - but never blame yourself. It's never your fault. But it's always your fault, because if you wanted to change you're the one who has got to change." -- Katharine Hepburn

item.title: Vicky add a quote by Pablo Neruda
item.description: "I love you without knowing how, or when, or from where, I love you simply, without problems or pride: I love you in this way because I don’t know any other way of loving." -- Pablo Neruda

item.title: Vicky add a quote by Pablo Neruda
item.description: "To feel the love of people whom we love is a fire that feeds our life." -- Pablo Neruda

item.title: Vicky add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Always forgive your enemies; nothing annoys them so much." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Vicky add a quote by Nadia Scrieva
item.description: "Victory is always bittersweet." -- Nadia Scrieva

item.title: Vicky add a quote by Ava Gardner
item.description: "Go fuck yourself," I replied, always the lady. "I'm staying here." -- Ava Gardner

item.title: Vicky add a quote by Pablo Neruda
item.description:
"I crave your mouth, your voice, your hair. Silent and starving, I prowl through the streets. Bread does not nourish me, dawn disrupts me, all day I hunt for the liquid measure of your steps.
I hunger for your sleek laugh, your hands the color of a savage harvest, hunger for the pale stones of your fingernails, I want to eat your skin like a whole almond.
I want to eat the sunbeam flaring in your lovely body, the sovereign nose of your arrogant face, I want to eat the fleeting shade of your lashes,
and I pace around hungry, sniffing the twilight, hunting for you, for your hot heart, Like a puma in the barrens of Quitratue." -- Pablo Neruda

item.title: Vicky add a quote by Pablo Neruda
item.description: "so I wait for you like a lonely house till you will see me again and live in me. Till then my windows ache." -- Pablo Neruda

item.title: Vicky add a quote by John Wayne
item.description: "Life's hard. It's even harder when you're stupid." -- John Wayne

item.title: Vicky add a quote by oscar wilde
item.description: "You don't love someone for their looks, or their clothes, or for their fancy car, but because they sing a song only you can hear." -- oscar wilde

item.title: Vicky add a quote by Rumi
item.description: "Sit, be still, and listen, because you're drunk and we're at the edge of the roof." -- Rumi

item.title: Vicky add a quote by Henry Rollins
item.description: "Scar tissue is stronger than regular tissue. Realize the strength, move on." -- Henry Rollins

item.title: Vicky add a quote by Pablo Neruda
item.description: "In this part of the story I am the one who dies, the only one, and I will die of love because I love you, because I love you, Love, in fire and in blood." -- Pablo Neruda

item.title: Vicky add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "If you are not long, I will wait for you all my life." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Vicky add a quote by Jess C. Scott
item.description: "When someone loves you, the way they say your name is different. You know that your name is safe in their mouth." -- Jess C. Scott

item.title: Vicky add a quote by Khaled Hosseini
item.description: "But better to get hurt by the truth than comforted with a lie." -- Khaled Hosseini

item.title: Vicky add a quote by Stephanie Klein
item.description: "Tell the truth, or someone will tell it for you." -- Stephanie Klein

item.title: Vicky add a quote by Margaret Mitchell
item.description: "Life's under no obligation to give us what we expect." -- Margaret Mitchell

item.title: Vicky add a quote by A.A. Milne
item.description: "If you live to be a hundred, I want to live to be a hundred minus one day so I never have to live without you." -- A.A. Milne

item.title: Vicky add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "You realize that our mistrust of the future makes it hard to give up the past." -- Chuck Palahniuk
